title: Smart Data models - Machine-Model schema
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic machine model. This entity is primarily associated with the industry segment and related IoT applications. The machineModel includes a hierarchical structure that allows machine models to be grouped in a flexible way.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity identifier. It has to be ManufacturingMachineModel

documentation.description: Property. Reference to data sheet or other manufacturerâ€™s documentation about this MachineModel.

manufacturerName.description: Property. The name of manufacturer of this MachineModel.

brandName.description: Property. The brand name of this MachineModel.

manufacturingMachineType.description: Property. A List of functional categories which this machineModel supports. Enum:'robot, cnc, 2dPrinter, 3dPrinter, 3dScanner, lathe, injectionMolding, laserCutter, millingMachine, grindingMachine, stampingMachine, oven, kiln, packaging, mixer, dryer, fan, saw'

version.description: Property. The manufacturer defined version number for the machine model.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

machineModelParent.description: Relationship. References any higher level MachineModel that this machine model is based on.

machineModelChildren.description: Relationship. References any lower level MachineModel entities that are based on this machine model.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

processDescription.description: Property. A description of the industrial process carried out by this machine.

standardOperations.description: Property. Lists the standard set of operations supported by this machineModel.

root.description: Property. A logical indicator that this Manufacturing Machine Model is the root of a Machine Model hierarchy.True indicates it is the root, false indicates that it is not the root.
